events.message: I am filing a claim regarding a car accident that occurred last night involving rear-end collision on the highway.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and statements provided.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your car accident claim and will be your point of contact moving forward.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and have begun preliminary processing of the case.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and any witness statements to support your claim.
All requested documents including accident photos and official police reports have been uploaded successfully.
Investigation into the circumstances of the car collision is now underway to determine fault and liability.
The investigation is complete, confirming the other driver was at fault, supporting your claim fully.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the estimated damages to your vehicle after the accident.
Thank you for your prompt response and cooperation throughout this claims process; your feedback has been recorded.
Your car accident claim has been officially approved, and we are preparing the payment documentation.
The settlement payment has been issued to your bank account to cover the vehicle repair costs.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed following the completion of all required procedures.
